Posts.Content: I have been on that combo for 11 cycles - last scans in January showed stable, so it is difficult to predict how long anyone gets on this combo - if you tolerate it, it is a good one, at least I think so! I have low neutrophils from the Ibrance so often wait 2 weeks between cycles, so far so good though. All the best to you!
Posts.Title: Ibrance and letrozole combo
